#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		long long count=0,max=0,count1=0;
		for(long long i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='1')count1++;
		}
		for(long long i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='0')count++;
			else if(count>0)count--;
		//	if(count<0)count=0;
			if(max<count)
			{
				max=count;
			}
		}
		if(count1==s.length())
		cout<<count1-1<<endl;
		else
		cout<<count1+max<<endl;
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
